Name: Fresh Start Cleaning Simulator
About the game: Welcome to the world that needs your help! Post-apocalyptic simulator of cleaning up and repairing a fallen world in single-player FPS mode. Clean polluted environment, repair, renovate and turn on broken objects long forgotten by time. Make new friends, take care of nature or even plant a forest. Give these places a Fresh Start! CLEANSE THE WORLD AROUND YOU! A wonderful machine has been put in your hands, it is a combination of a vacuum cleaner and a fire hose! While traveling the world, you can wash away piles of mud and dirt from the surface of the earth, and you will drag piles of waste and rubbish with your hyper vacuum cleaner. WATER THE DRIED-UP PLANTS AND BRING BACK THEIR BEAUTY Use the power of the water-tip to bring dry and dead plants back to life. Water the ones that are just sprouting to help them bloom in full force! HELP OTHER AND MAKE FRIENDS! The world is full of characters waiting for your help! Use your abilities to bring them comfort and happiness into their lives and you will quickly gain gratitude and friendship. SEARCH FOR MYSTERIOUS ITEMS AND SOLVE PUZZLES Sometimes you will have to find the necessary items to run machines that have not been used for a long time, connect broken cables or put the necessary elements in the right places to enjoy fully functioning objects again.
